original_text: And I will send a fire on Magog, and among them that dwell carelessly in the isles: and they shall know that I am the Lord.
korean_text: 내가 또 불을 마곡과 및 섬에 평안히 거주하는 자에게 내리리니 내가 여호와인 줄을 그들이 알리라

sentences.original_text: And I will send a fire on Magog
and among them that dwell carelessly in isles
and they shall know that I am the Lord
